Address.value: 8503 HILLTOP DRIVE, OOLTEWAH, Tennessee, 37363, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Miller Industries Inc is engaged in the manufacturing of vehicle towing and recovery equipment. The company produces wreckers, car carriers, and trailer bodies under the Century, Vulcan, Challenger, Holmes, Champion, Chevron, Eagle, Titan, Jige, and Boniface brands. The products are sold primarily in North America, Canada, and Mexico through independent distributors.
